item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Price Slashed In Rare Double Offer
item.description: Samsung has two new codes for Galaxy S25 Ultra buyers that significantly drops the price of the 2025 flagship.

item.title: Shelter Dog’s ‘Superman’ Cameo Leads To Adoptions Of Other Super Dogs
item.description: Sparrow, a terrier mix who landed at Maury County Animal Services Center in Tennessee in 2023 now appears in James Gunn’s “Superman.”

item.title: The Weak Link: Hidden Chip Connections Crash Your Calls, Cars And Care
item.description: Invisible ‘in‑between’ links still sabotage modern tech. Specialist chipmakers are now racing to secure signals and restore reliability

item.title: Why Your Brand Is Your Only Defense Against AI's Sea Of Sameness
item.description: As AI is bypassing your website, your brand becomes more important than ever to drive growth.
